name: Stevedore
summary: A tool for extracting tables from PDFs
description: A quick, easy tool for extracting tables and spreadsheets from PDFs. If a PDF has a data table, upload it to Tabula, draw a box around the table and download your data in Excel format. N.B., if the PDF is scanned (i.e. you can't click-and-drag to select the numbers in the table), it won't work.
